amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds in the bill by the IRS to act in contravention of the Federal Records Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of chapter 29, 31, or 33 of title 44, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Walberg.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
